6ABD7FD845CEEBD8EC4E02A3AF779DB2: Presents links to profile information about the island’s creator.
BF7A44F24958950C3B72C09F1D138187: Presents links to profile information about the island’s creator.
DBB3A6D44E7D0EB24398B586BA4D7B13: Presents links to profile information about the island’s creator.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_CreatorProfile_C.TwoSided.Descrip: Determines if the device will display on both sides of the billboard.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CreatorProfile_C.EnabledDuringPha: Determines which phases the device is enabled in. Pre-Game includes all phases that occur before the game starts (including while waiting for players in the lobby).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CreatorProfile_C.Disabled.Descrip: Fires an event when the device is Disabled
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CreatorProfile_C.Enabled.Descript: Fires an event when the device is Enabled
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CreatorProfile_C.FaceCamera.Descr: When enabled the creator profile information will automatically rotate to face players’ cameras.
